Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
We sense weakness in your vitality. For too long we have been ignored. We hunger. We must feed. We shall cull your citizen flock.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS_DLC03@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
我们感觉到了你生命力中的弱点。我们被忽视太久了。我们饥饿。我们必须进食。我们将捕杀你的平民。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS_DLC03@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

We cannot support our ancient followers. They are restless. They must feed. Your abundance of Essence calls to them. Feed them with your lives. {XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS_DLC03@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
我们无法供给我们的古代追随者。他们焦躁不安。他们必须进食。你丰富的精华在召唤他们。我们将用你的生命喂养他们。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS_DLC03@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Your lives are short, so easily wasted in the pointless pursuit of fleeting ideals. We will grant your Essence freedom to nourish us. Share with us. We must feed. You will do us an honor by giving us great sustenance.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS_DLC03@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
你们的生命短暂无比，轻易地被浪费在追求那些毫无意义而又稍纵即逝的理想之上。我们将释放你们的精华来滋养我们。与我们分享。我们必须进食。给予我们伟大的营养是你们的荣幸。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS_DLC03@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added
We are taxed by your actions. All that Essence that we must not consume. Give us Energy for now.
你的行为使我们付出了代价。那些精华本不应该被浪费。现在，给我们能量。
Your Essence intoxicates us. You do what you wish and share none of it. Give us Cosmite instead.
你的精华使我们陶醉。你可以做你想做之事，不用与我们分享。但作为代价，你需要给我们宇宙合金。
We cannot continue our close ties with you occupying the lands without sharing your Essence. Give us this sector so that we can consume those therein.
你们占领土地却不分享精华，我们不能继续与你保持紧密的关系。把这片区域交给我们，让我们吞噬其中的精华。
Is Creator insufficient for thy peace? Disloyal oath-breaker, cease your devotion to false gods and creeds. We require your whole Essence; all else is vanity. We cannot tolerate your infidelity.”
难道连造物主都无法让你平静？不忠的毁誓者，停止你对虚伪的神灵和信条的奉献。我们需要你的全部精华；其他一切都是毫无价值的。我们不能容忍你的背信弃义。
[br/][br/](We can negotiate for peace by contacting this faction's dwelling.)
[br/][br/]（我们可以联系这个阵营的居住地来协商和平。）
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
